address: via Umberto I 25, località Valle Sauglio
description: A well - run restaurant in a quiet area just outside the village, where the owner - chef serves modern cuisine with the occasional regional influence. Careful attention is given to the use of seasonal produce and natural herbs, and there is a small selection of fish - based dishes.
